title: The Kona Libre CR Wants to Be Your Next Racey Gravel Bike
content:
Kona has announced a second generation of its Libre gravel bike called the Libre CR. According to Kona, this new gravel bike moves away from being the generalist everything to everyone gravel bike to one that leans into an edgier, performance bend.
